Posts.Content: mkm66 wrote: I had my biopsy today.  I was told I'd have the results in 1 week to 1 1/2 weeks.  My GYN had told me two weeks, at least.  I'm wondering if this part of the waiting game is easier or harder.  I'm still a wreck, and last night I was crying hysterically for fear of the unknown!
